title: [Large-scale] In-depth Science Concept Learning Through Multimedia Explanation Design

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental science concepts and basic multimedia tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Strengthening conceptual understanding through the integration of visual materials and text in smartphone-centric constrained technological environments.

learning_goals: Learners can independently design multimedia materials (text + visual elements) explaining scientific concepts
Learners apply spatial arrangement principles of multimedia materials (e.g., proximity of text and images) to actual learning resources

Over two weeks, learners will improve two or more multimedia materials (videos or presentations) explaining scientific experiment processes based on three or more rounds of peer feedback (e.g., adding visual elements, clarifying explanations) and submit final deliverables

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
